Some of these words are general words in everyday use, e.g., authentic,, etc. Others are used in specializedfields. Certainly you have heard terms like antibiotic, orthopedic, and pediatricianin the field of medicine; astronaut, protoplasm; and thermonuclear in science andautonomous, demagogue, and protocol in government.", "These important words, and others like them in this unit, are constructed fromGreek word elements. Once you know what a particular word element means, youhave a clue to the meaning of words derived from it. Some of these words are general words in everyday use, e.g., authentic,, etc. Others are used in specializedfields. Certainly you have heard terms like antibiotic, orthopedic, and pediatricianin the field of medicine; astronaut, protoplasm; and thermonuclear in science andautonomous, demagogue, and protocol in government.", "These important words, and others like them in this unit, are constructed fromGreek word elements. Once you know what a particular word element means, youhave a clue to the meaning of words derived from it.
